Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يَعْتَبِرْ بِغِيَرِهِ لَمْ يَسْتَظْهِرْ لِنَفْسِهِ
enWisdom: One who does not take lesson from others does not take precaution for himself

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يَعْتَبِرْ بِتَصَارِيفِ الْأَيَّامِ لَمْ يَنْزَجِرْ بِالْمَلَامِ
enWisdom: One who does not take a lesson from the passage of days is not deterred by reproach

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يَتَّعِظْ بِالنَّاسِ وَعَظَ اللَّهُ النَّاسَ بِهِ
enWisdom: Whoever does not take lesson from [what happens to] the people, Allah makes an example out of him for the people

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يَعْتَبِرْ بِغِيَرِ [بِعِبَرِ] الدُّنْيَا وَصُرُوفِهَا لَمْ تَنْجَعْ فِيهِ الْمَوَاعِظُ
enWisdom: One who does not take lesson from the vicissitudes of this world, advice has no effect on him

Wisdom: لَا فِكْرَ لِمَنْ لَا اعْتِبَارَ لَهُ
enWisdom: One who does not take lessons [from the past] does not reflect

Wisdom: لَا اعْتِبَارَ لِمَنْ لَا ازْدِجَارَ لَهُ
enWisdom: There is no lesson to be taken for the one who has no restraint
